snoopy.blindnote: (20100630末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807, Maden, E. H., and Wakeman, J. A. (1988). Pseudouridine distribution in mammalian 18 S ribosomal RNA. A major cluster in the central region of the molecule. Biochem J 249, 459-464, Schattner, P., Barberan-Soler, S., and Lowe, T. M. (2006). A computational screen for mammalian pseudouridylation guide H/ACA RNAs. Rna 12, 15-25.
